Class GameFunction

public class GameFunction
extends java.lang.Object
Contains the rest of the game methods and game information.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameFunction

      public GameFunction​(Player player)

  • Method Details

    • getInput

      public int getInput​(int min, int max)
      Asks the user for an integer input within a specified range (min, max).
      Parameters:
      min - The lower limit
      max - The upper limit
      Returns:
      An integer value within a specified range (min, max).

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex​(int move)
      Looks for the user's chosen spell in the list spellName. Will compare the user's chosen spell to the existing spells in the list spellName. Will return the index of a spell in the list spellName that matches the user's chosen spell.
      Parameters:
      move - An integer that specifies the spell whose index must be taken.
      Returns:
      An integer value that tells the index of the user's chosen spell in the list spellName.

    • getSpellLimit

      public int getSpellLimit​(int move)
      Return the spell limit or the number of times a specified spell can be used. Looks for the specified spell's limit in the list spellData
      Parameters:
      move - An integer that specifies the spell whose limit must be taken.
      Returns:
      An integer value that tells the number of times a spell can be used.
